title: Shirazi Salad (Persian Cucumber Tomato Salad)

ingredients.name: white wine vinegar or sour grape juice

steps: Combine cucumber, tomato, and onion in a large bowl.
Sprinkle dried mint, salt, and pepper over vegetables.
Drizzle with olive oil, vinegar, and lime juice.
Toss everything together until evenly mixed.
Let the salad rest for 10-15 minutes if you have time to allow flavors to develop.
notes: Volume conversions: 2 cups cucumber ≈ 300g, 2 cups tomatoes ≈ 400g, ½ cup onion ≈ 75g, 3 tbsp olive oil ≈ 42g, 2 tbsp lime juice ≈ 30g, 2 tbsp vinegar ≈ 30g, 1 tbsp dried mint ≈ 4g
Fresh mint can be substituted for dried
No need to peel or deseed cucumbers - Persian, English, or regular varieties work
Vegetables can be chopped 3-4 days ahead; store undressed and add dressing before serving
